name: The Iguanys Project
short_description:
IguanysOS, a project i've been working on made entirely in visual basic 2010. If you have downloaded Iguanys at all you will realize it is a windows application. so i just want to clarify for you : this is NOT a real os. just a suite of applications piled into 1 program simulating a desktop environment. Due to possible credit theft, i am only uploading the source for beta 1.2.0. it doesnt have all the features of the newest version, Land iguana but it is a good model for a VBOS.
when the next version comes out, i will upload the source for land iguana.
